trans-unit.source: Represents the root element of an XML document containing the results of all files written when the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll(System.String,System.String)"></xref> method is invoked.

When you invoke the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, all resolved discovery documents and a file containing a map of all those files are saved to a directory.

The map file is described in XML with the root element being <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoveryClientResultsFile>; this class is passed to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class to serialize the results.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoveryClientResultsFile"></xref> class.

A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientResultCollection"></xref> containing the results from a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ReadAll(System.String)"></xref> or <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll(System.String,System.String)"></xref> invocation.
